channel.title: Cannot Trade Within First 30 Min [Dementhium] [639]
channel.description: How can i make it so players cannot trade for the first 30 minutes of their account... Of course not many people help me on this so i'm not expecting comments... So why don't we all just view and press back (:

item.title: Cannot Trade Within First 30 Min [Dementhium] [639]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

That would prob be the simpler idea for you: lower the starter value.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Trade Within First 30 Min [Dementhium] [639]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“M.I.A., post:4, topic:438074”]Well i would fine 10-15 minutes reasonable… It is only for new players and then it wont occur anymore… Lately people make new accounts to transfer starters which is seemingly ruining the economy… Besides it’s not like they would need to trade right away… They can train, skill, start some mini-quests. Regardless, thank you i appreciate you both for, i would suppose “helping” me or atleast responding so i’m aware somebody can :o.

Have a great day.[/quote]

If you’re wanting this to prevent abuse of your starter, in my opinion, your starter is way too big. None of this should be occurring in the first place if you want an economy.

My suggestion would be to lower their starter because even if you implement this, you’re just delaying the inevitable.

Nonetheless to answer your question, do what imsuperman05 said, except to expand on his idea, include a player save. So nothing ipwnu2day says can happen, or if it does, they won’t lose any time logged in.

Read full topic

Well i would fine 10-15 minutes reasonable… It is only for new players and then it wont occur anymore… Lately people make new accounts to transfer starters which is seemingly ruining the economy… Besides it’s not like they would need to trade right away… They can train, skill, start some mini-quests. Regardless, thank you i appreciate you both for, i would suppose “helping” me or atleast responding so i’m aware somebody can :o.

Have a great day.

item.title: Cannot Trade Within First 30 Min [Dementhium] [639]
item.dc:creator: @ipwnu2day ipwnu2day
item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

imsuperman05:

Create an event once the player logs in, counting down an variable each time the event is cycled through for 30 minutes.

Well that isn’t very good. Every time you log in you have to wait 30 minutes?

Here is the problem with this idea:

  1. What if you wanted to trade with your best friend or staff immediately?
  2. What if your computer accidentally crashes, internet shuts off, or maybe a power outage?
  3. What if you updated the server?

Do you see what I mean? It is ridiculous. Make it 5 minutes, or something. Something that is reasonable. I’m pretty sure people on your server would get peed off at you for making it 30 minutes.

Read full topic
